$\text{如图可知：}$

$2A=ad$

$2B=(a-c)(b-d)=ab-ad-bc+cd$

$2C=bc$

$\text{可得出}$

$2B=ab-2A-2C+cd$

$\frac{2A\times 2C}{ab}=\frac{4AC}{ab}=cd$

$\therefore 2(A+B+C)=ab+\frac{4AC}{ab}$

$\text{设$ab($正方形总面积$)$为$x$，原式等于}$

$\text{即}$

$\text{$\because$答案$=ab-A-B-C$}$

$\text{$\therefore$答案$=A+B+C\pm\sqrt{(A+B+C)^2-4AC}-A-B-C$}$

$\text{$\qquad\ =\pm\sqrt{(A+B+C)^2-4AC}$}$

$\text{$\therefore$答案为正数}$

$\text{$\therefore$答案$=\sqrt{(A+B+C)^2-4AC}$}$
